name: Tor Browser
short_description: Privacy-focused web browser with Tor network integration.
description: Privacy-focused web browser with Tor network integration. Tor Browser is a self-hosted application focused on privacy, security, anonymous, tor. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Tor Browser on your home server to privacy-focused web browser with tor network integration without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Tor Browser to manage your privacy workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
